products.title: Annual Citrus Tree Feed
products.description: Buy a years worth of citrus feed with our Annual Citrus Feed Pack. The twin pack contains 1 tub of summer citrus feed and 1 tub of winter citrus feed. The summer citrus feed is ideal for any citrus tree variety and can be applied weekly from April to September. The high nitrogen fertiliser supports the growth of new, healthy green leaves and prevents the premature ripening of fruits to limit fruit drop throughout the summer season. Provide everything your citrus tree needs through autumn and winter with the winter citrus feed. Citrus trees can produce fragrant blossom year-round so it’s important they get a steady supply of nutrients, even in the winter. Providing nourishment through the colder months will maintain balanced growth and help prevent leaf drop and discolouration. Apply on a monthly basis from October to March. * 1 x Summer Citrus Feed * 1 x Winter Citrus Feed * Apply summer feed weekly from April to September * Apply winter feed monthly from October to March * Mix 1 teaspoon of feed in 2.5L (4 pints) of water * Allow water to come to room temperature before watering.

Watching one of our trees flourish and thrive is a thoughtful way to remember every wagging tail or satisfied purr. Browse our range of native saplings! Each one is steeped in Celtic mythology and has distinct natural beauty, so you are sure to have the right gift to remember a pet. You can even engrave your pet’s name, a fond memory, or a farewell message onto our plaque for a personal touch. Native saplings are hardy and thrive in our UK weather. They can be planted in a large garden or grown in a large pot for 5 years before finding a spot to settle in. Just make sure they get sunlight and water and soon enough your loved ones will be looking up to admire this gift. * Native Tree Sapling of your choice * Native saplings are deciduous so lose their leaves in October-April * Personalised engraved plaque - up to 80 characters * Choose a Pet Memorial greetings card when you place your order * Delivered with a wooden plinth (FSC assured) * Tree protector tube and stake * Delivered in a purpose-made gift box made in the UK.

products.title: Sapphire Anniversary Rose and Seed Gift Set
products.description: Celebrate a very special 45th wedding anniversary with our Sapphire Wedding Anniversary Rose and Seed Gift Pack. Our pack contains the beautiful sapphire rose bush, a love seedbom and cornflower power seedbom. A landmark occasion deserves a gift that is living, lasting, and full of meaning. The rose bush arrives gift-wrapped and flourishes every summer and produces lush, lilac-blue blooms. Once the seedboms are growing they bloom into a rich mix of vibrant blue Forget-me-nots and wild cornflowers, perfect for the occasion. Order our Sapphire 45th Anniversary Rose and Seed gift pack, add a personalised greetings card, and choose a day for delivery. We’ll handle the rest. * [SEASONAL_MSG] * Deciduous rose bush (few leaves from Oct - Mar) * Arrives with a height of 30-50cm in a 3.5L - 4.5L pot * Seedboms are easy to use, just throw and grow! * Recommend planted growth, fully hardy in the UK * Delivered gift-wrapped * Lilac blue floribunda rose with vibrant blue wildflowers

products.title: Nectarine Tree Gift
products.description: Send a Nectarine Tree Gift to give someone a yearly juicy crop of Nectarines. This Nectarine tree is best suited to Southern gardens. The word Nectarine means "Sweet as Nectar" and these fruits are certainly that. A close relative of the peach but with a smooth skin the Nectarine is every bit as good. Nectarines are very low in calories but high in Vitamin A and Potassium. The fruit will store in a refrigerator which will slow down the ripening process. The red flushed skin of the Snow Queen Nectarine hides a creamy juicy flesh that is bursting with sweet flavour. It is probably the best variety of Nectarine for home growing although it does require a slightly warmer position than a peach would. The tree produces flowers in spring and the fruit is ready for picking from early August. * The Snow Queen Nectarine is a self pollinating tree * This Nectarine tree does require warmer conditions and so it is best suited for growing in a greenhouse * The Snow Queen Nectarine tree has received an Award of Merit from the Royal Horticultural Society * Tree supplied is pot grown and comes in a 10 Litre pot. Approximately 150cm (5ft.) in height.

products.title: Christmas Mini Olive Tree Gift
products.description: Impress the in-laws who have everything with a Mini Christmas Olive Tree Gift this year! This elf-sized Olive Tree is short but sweet and is the perfect size for a small garden, patio or balcony. The silvery, evergreen leaves look stunning throughout the year and the branches would be perfectly at home on the Christmas table as symbols of peace, hope and joy. Just make sure that it is placed in a sheltered spot in the garden to protect it from Jack Frost's mischievous touch. products.title: Blackberry Bush Gift
products.description: Our blackberry plant gifts are delightful presents for berry lovers of all ages. The blackberry is also known for its lovely whitish-pink blossom, so when placed in a decorative pot on a patio or outdoor space, this juicy gift will add an abundance of colour and life to the garden. In the summer months, the blossom of the blackberry plant will turn into a blackish-purple berry that is perfect for picking straight off the bush, or it can be used as an ingredient in baked goods- such as a delicious apple and blackberry crumble! products.title: James Grieve Apple Tree Gift
products.description: The James Grieve Apple Tree is a self pollinating fruit tree that produces versatile yellow apples that are great for both cooking and eating. The dual-purpose apple is great for eating fresh, cooking and even for a tipple of homemade cider or apple juice. James Grieve apples can be picked early in the season while still fairly firm, this is around late August time. When the young fruit is used as a cooking apple holds its shape well and delivers a delicious but tangy, sharp flavour. As the apple matures it mellows and develops a soft texture, similar to a firm pear. products.title: Mixed Currant Plant Box Gift
products.description: Our Mixed Currant gift box contains a perfect partnership of red and blackcurrants, great gift for currant lovers and foodies. The Ben Connan blackcurrant is a hardy and tolerant blackcurrant plant, resistant to frost and mildew it is a good heavy cropper and when established can produce up to 8lb of delicious currants. Currants are ready for picking from the beginning of July and can fruit for long periods, if you are short of space they can also be container grown. The large glossy currants have a sweet flavour and can be used in a multitude of scrumptious recipes. Also high in vitamin C and antioxidants the blackcurrant is described as natures number 1 "super fruits". It is used to combat many gripes and ailments including soothing sore throats, reducing high fevers and easing arthritic aches and pains. WARNING These currants are so tasty they may not make it to the kitchen The Jonkheer van tets redcurrant or JVT for short is a modern dutch redcurrant variety. it is a hardy plant and is resistant of many common garden diseases. It produces large shiny bright red currants which are ready for harvesting from early july. The currants are highly flavoured and are sweeter than most redcurrants. The JVT currants go very well with fatty meats such as duck or lamb and make great jellies. Redcurrants are high in Vitamin C and B1 and are said to have stomach calming qualities. The dried leaves also make tea which can be used to ease rheumatic pains. Red and blackcurrants make a great team and when put together result in yummy jam, summer pudding and pavlova. * 1 x Ben Connan Blackcurrant plant in a 3L pot * 1 x JVT Redcurrant plant in a 3L pot * Prefers full sun but will tolerate light shade * Both plants have RHS Awards of Garden Merit * JVT prefers rich, moist but well drained soil * Ben Connan prefers light, moist but well drained soil.

products.description: A deliciously golden apple tree gift to send for any occasion. The fruit is exactly what it says on the tin.. golden in colour and delicious in flavour. The Golden Delicious is at it's best when eaten straight from the tree and has a crispy texture and sugar sweet flavour. You will never find a Golden Delicious apple at it's sweetest in the supermarket as the flavour diminishes in storage. It is also a brilliant apple to cook with as its sweetness means you can cut down on the amount of sugar used in recipes. It also holds its shape well, making it perfect for pastries and pies. Nothing can quite compare to watching a baby grow up alongside your thoughtful gift. Choose one of our native saplings! This hardy bunch belongs to our Ancient Wisdom range; each one is steeped in Celtic symbolism and has distinct season beauty to offer. You are sure to find just the right tree and sentiment for the occasion. Our native saplings are easy to care for and all too comfortable with our British weather. Don’t worry if you don’t have a large garden, our saplings can be pot grown for 5 years before finding a spot to settle in; it could be in a new family home, a Grandparent’s garden, or a hidden wooded spot that only they know. * Native Tree Sapling of your choice * Native saplings are deciduous so lose their leaves from October-April * Personalised engraved plaque - up to 80 characters * Choose a Christening greetings card when you place your order * Delivered with a wooden plinth (FSC assured) * Tree protector tube and stake * Delivered in a purpose-made gift box made in the UK.

products.title: For You With Love Rose Bush Gift
products.description: Our For You With Love Rose gift is a beautiful floribunda variety. The buds that arrive on the rose bush in Spring will be a dark vermilion in colour. The bright orange blooms will open at the beginning of Summer and last all the way till the Winter frosts. Orange roses are particularly new and a blaze of passion, energy and enthusiasm. They’re a perfect blend of everything love and friendship. This makes a wonderful sentiment and a well-received gift for any special occasion. When the roses emerge the garden will be set alight with bright, fiery petals that stand out from the rest of the greenery. The rose has a pleasant scent that will fill the warm Summer air with a wonderful fragrance. Send someone the gift of an everlasting bunch of flowers that will bloom year after year. * The For You With Love Rose is an orangey, red Floribunda variety. * Can be kept in the pot or planted in the garden. * Plant in full sun or partial shade. * Keep compost moist but not wet. * Delivered in a 3.5L pot * Plant dispatched is approximately 30-50cm tall depending on time of year. * This rose bush produces blooms with a medium scent.

products.title: Large Willow Wand Gift - 98cm Hardwood Cutting - A Beautiful Living Sculpture - 9th Anniversary Gift
products.description: A piece of living art for your garden. The Willow Wand Gift is made from 9 living willow whips, expertly selected and hand-woven by our master weavers. The stem height will never change, but the topiary crown of the Willow Wand will become dense and bushy. Over the first few seasons, the separate strands of the Willow Wand will graft together to become one single trunk whilst retaining its beautiful twisted features. Place your living sculptor on patios and balconies for an instant effect. For loved ones celebrating their 9th Willow Wedding Anniversary, our Willow Wand is both a fitting and gorgeous gift to show your love and support. * Thrives in partial shade to full sun locations * Fully hardy - can withstand extreme frosts * Keep compost moist at all times * Maintain the woven effect of the stem by removing buds that grow below the decorative dried willow band * The willow wand must be kept outdoors * Available in medium and large *The willow wands are supplied as hardwood cuttings. Planting is required within 3 days from delivery. Pot not included.

products.title: Spirit in The Sky Rose Bush Gift - A Beautiful Tribute - Soft Pink Colour And A Delicate Fragrance
products.description: Pay tribute to a loved one lost or show support for friends and family with our Spirit in the Sky Rose Bush Gift. We hope this gift is a respectful alternative, full of life, colour, and meaning, and brings comfort in times of hardship. Lush, green foliage, shoots, and buds arrive in spring, marking an end to bleak winter months. Summer welcomes pristine roses with a soft pink colour and a delicate fragrance. They enrich any garden with understated beauty and our beloved butterflies, birds, and bees! This floribunda variety is loved for the particularly large batch of flowers it grows all summer long. When winter comes, do not worry, our rose bushes are UK grown and fully hardy in our terrible weather. It couldn’t be easier to order this thoughtful gift! Click ‘Add to Basket’ to add a personalised card then choose a day for delivery. We’ll handle the gift wrapping. * [SEASONAL_MSG] * Arrives with a height of 30-50cm * Delivered in a 3.5L pot * Roses may arrive pruned back in the interest of full and healthy growth * Shoots and buds arrive in spring, flowers arrive in summer * Blooms have a delicate scent * Recommend planted growth in full sun, hardy in the UK * Floribunda variety delivered gift-wrapped * Variety. Spirit in the Sky

products.title: Yucca Plant
products.description: Buy an indoor Yucca Plant and add a piece of the Mexican desert to your home. This easy to care for plant arrives gift wrapped with a beautiful bow. It's a symbol of protection in Native American culture and looks marvellous in any home. See for yourself, you simply won’t regret it! The large Yucca Plant has a unique appearance a rough, brown trunk topped with lush, sword-shaped leaves. The leaves are evergreen so they look resplendent in any season. It will flourish in the home in a bright room that gets plenty of sunlight. Beginners and those that forget to water their plants need not worry, the Yucca is even drought tolerant. Our Yucca Plant normally arrives with 1 stem at a substantial height of 45cm. All you need to do is click ‘Add to Basket, add a personalised card if you’re sending it as a gift, and choose a day for delivery. We’ll handle the rest. * Arrives at a height of 45cm * Our Yucca Plants are usually delivered with 1 stem * Delivered in a gift wrapped 2Lpot * Thrives in full light and moist soil - water less in winter months * Our indoor Yucca Plant prefers bright rooms and is drought tolerant * Air-purifying indoor plant that removes toxins from the air * The Latin name for the Yucca Plant is Yucca elephantipes *Yucca being dispatched is currently 1 stem

products.title: Trio of Willow Wands Gift - Medium 73cm High - Plant As A Stunning Living Sculpture In The Garden
products.description: The versatile Trio of Willow Wands Gift can be planted as a ‘living sculpture’ in your garden. The stem height is fixed with only the crown being allowed to develop. This is trimmed to any desired shape and size, as per topiary. The crown of The Willow Wand will quickly grow and fill out during the first season. Plant it, water it, watch it grow, and in as little as 6 weeks the decorative stem will magically grow a beautiful topiary crown. Over the first few seasons grafts together into a single trunk, retaining its stunning woven effect. Simply trim the crown to any desired shape; perfect to plant as a trio. Each one of the 3 willow wands is hand crafted in the UK from 9 living willow stems which are expertly selected by our master weavers and woven by hand with great accuracy and skill into a visually stunning, symmetrical ‘Wand’. * Choose your size from the drop-down * This pack contains 3 wands * Medium height: 73cm * Large height: 98cm * Plant as a stunning living sculpture in the garden * The wands arrive ready to be planted into the ground or into containers.* *The willow wands are supplied as hardwood cuttings. Planting is required within 3 days from delivery. Pot not included. **Please allow up to 5 working days for delivery.

products.title: Pink Perfection Flowering Cherry Tree Gift
products.description: Our Pink Perfection Cherry Tree is named after its immaculate pink flowers. Loved ones can expect a stunning spring display as this particular tree flowers considerably more than others. Its natural femininity and links to life, beauty, and rebirth make this a thoughtful gift for weddings, anniversaries, and memorials. Friends and family will wait excitedly for the cherry blossom to arrive. Around March, perfect pink, double flowers burst to life in abundance, releasing sweet fragrances before shedding like confetti. Summer sees glossy, green leaves grow and autumn turns them bronze; every season has something to offer. Our Flowering Cherry Tree cares for itself during winter, shedding its leaves and getting ready for another spring display. Rest assured, this gift is perfect for Mother’s Day and spring celebrations. Click ‘Add to Basket’ to add a personalised card then choose a day for delivery. Our trees are gift-wrapped so bringing joy to loved ones couldn’t be easier. * Deciduous flowering cherry tree (bare from Nov - Mar) * Delivered in a 30cm (12L) pot * Arrives with a height of 1.5m (5ft) and can grow to 4m (13ft) * Can be planted or potted and thrives in full sun and well-drained soil * Ideal for small to medium sized gardens * Flowers appear in spring and leaves bronze in autumn * Perfect for spring occasions, weddings, and anniversaries * Prunus Pink Perfection variety.

products.title: Wollemi Pine Tree Gift
products.description: Our Wollemi Pine Tree is distinct in both appearance and history, making this a gift that stands out. This Jurassic-aged tree was discovered in Australia in 1994 with the species critically endangered. The Wollemi Pine Tree has dark, bumpy bark and exquisite, needle leaves. During the colder months, the Wollemi Pine becomes dormant and the buds take on a striking appearance - a white, waxy coating with ruby-coloured edges. In spring, the coating disappears and new growth bursts through. Wollemi Pines are naturally multi-stemmed but our nurseries prune them to a single stem to give an overall uniform shape. After some years, the Wollemi Pine produces long or round cones depending on whether it is male or female respectively. By planting just one Wollemi Pine, you can offset 2% of our carbon footprint and help preserve the species. Our Wollemi Pine Trees are delivered gift-wrapped and in our purpose-made packaging, certainly making for a unique and unusual gift for many occasions. * Dark, bumpy bark and needle leaves * Critically endangered * Can offset 2% of your carbon footprint * Produces round or long cones depending on the sex of the tree * Range of sizes- 5-6ft, 6-7ft, 7-9ft

products.title: Patio Plum Tree Gift
products.description: They won’t find a more fitting companion for their garden than our Patio Plum Tree. This smaller counterpart of the much larger Opal plum can grow to be as charming, but don't let its small size fool you - this fruit tree produces plenty in terms of jam makers and cook who need an ample supply! With VVA-1 rootstock (which means self-pollinating), it's easy enough that if they are left in a full sun position, they will turn out perfect plums with bright red colouring ready at harvest time every year. Soft, green leaves appear in winter and spring gives way to pristine white blossoms. In summer, our Plum Trees produces succulent plums with a bright red colour, ready to be picked in August every year. With a bright red fruit, the Patio Plum Tree is perfect for culinary enthusiasts. products.title: Small Fig Tree Gift for Planting - 40-70cm Height - Gift Wrapped Fruit Tree - Tree2mydoor
products.description: Small Fig Tree Gift - Send a small fig tree gift and let them make their very own Fig Rolls! This fig tree is not just a beautiful addition to any garden but a source of delicious and healthy fruit. The tree is hardy, thriving in the British climate and growing to a manageable size of around 3 meters (10 feet). You can expect your fig tree to arrive at around 40-70cm in height, depending on the time of year, and delivered in a 4-litre pot. This deciduous tree loses its leaves from October to March and then bursts back to life in the spring, producing gorgeous fruits from July to August. Figs are one of the first plants cultivated by humans, boasting a history mentioned in both the Bible and the Qur'an. These sweet, fleshy fruits are actually the flowers of the tree and have a unique appeal. They are highly versatile for both sweet and savory dishes and can be enjoyed straight off the tree or incorporated into delicious fig rolls. They also happen to be one of the highest plant sources of calcium and fiber. The large, decorative leaves of the fig tree add another dimension of beauty to your garden, creating a lush and welcoming atmosphere. To ensure your fig tree flourishes, it's important to protect the ends of the branches during the winter, as they carry the next year's crop. Using fleece for protection until after the last frost is recommended. As a bonus, the hardy nature of the fig tree makes it a reliable choice for any gardener, regardless of their experience level. So, gift a small fig tree, and let them experience the joy of growing their own sweet treats.

products.title: Dwarf Almond Tree Gift
products.description: Rooted in age-old traditions of love and luck, the Dwarf Almond Tree is a heartfelt gift for life’s sweetest milestones. With soft pink blossom in spring and delicious almonds by late summer, it’s a beautiful symbol of new beginnings and enduring affection. * Steeped in romance: Almonds have symbolised love, marriage and good fortune for centuries * Sweet edible harvest: Produces nutritious almonds ready to pick in late August * Springtime beauty: Covered in soft pink blooms every year * Perfect for small spaces: Grows to just 3m tall and thrives in gardens or large pots * Happily hardy: Robust dwarf variety, naturally resistant to leaf curl and easy to care for * Grown in the UK & gift-ready: Sustainably packaged and delivered at approx. 0.8m tall Legend says a single almond under the pillow brings dreams of true love. In ancient Greek and Middle Eastern traditions, they were tokens of fertility, joy and connection: five sugared almonds offered as wedding favours to bless couples with health, wealth and happiness. This special little tree carries all that history and hope in its roots. The Robijn Almond isn’t just a tree... it’s a meaningful moment, wrapped in blossom and nature’s quiet wisdom. With care, it will gift your loved one a lifetime of gentle beauty and seasonal delight. Send a gift that grows with love, nourishes the soul and blossoms with memory. Order the Dwarf Almond Tree today.
